name: One Button Blaster
description:
Entry for One Button Game Jam 2018!
https://itch.io/jam/1-button-jam

Controls:
Tap Left Mouse Button to fire and hold it to rotate your ship!

Description:

Making your way home from your job as usual, you find yourself the victim of a well thought out Bandit ambush! A person of technical abilities might be able to repair their ship, however you appear to have re-routed everything to work from the same button whilst the engines fire constantly. But hey, it works... sort of... but how long can you last in this state against the ever advancing, tireless and endless horde of bandits that are after your baked goods you picked up on Earth.

Instructions: 
Download and extract the .zip then use the .exe to play the game.

Assets Used:

Space Shooter Tutorial - Used the sounds, music and star particles from the tutorial pack by Unity.

Simple FX Cartoon Particles by Synty Studios - Explosion with Rubble

Universal Sound Effects Pack by Imphenzia - Used one sound for the missiles launching

Planets with Space Background in Flat Style - Space background and planets

Text Font by: 

with Reserved Font Name "Press Start".
